channel.title: Staff Zone
channel.description: ok so i am trying to add a staff zone to my server and i got the objects and everything in it but like people can teleport to me and i dont know how to change it where they cant so if you can plz post the command here and i will try it out it is for a {PI} base

item.title: Staff Zone
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

if you want ::item for admin here it is

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item") && c.playerRights >= 2) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("No such item."); } } else { c.sendMessage("Use as ::item 995 200"); } } catch(Exception e) { 
			}
		}</blockquote>

Read full topic

item.title: Staff Zone
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

use this code

if (playerCommand.equals("staffzone")) { c.getPA().movePlayer(xxxx,yyyy, 0); }
replace xxxx and yyyy with right co-ords now if you want it for mods + only add this
&& c.playerRights >= 1

so the command overall would look liek this

if (playerCommand.equals("staffzone")&& c.playerRights >= 1) { c.getPA().movePlayer(xxxx,yyyy, 0); }
but still enter right co-ords

Read full topic
